# Luke Stahl - Developer Marketer & Web Developer

> Personal portfolio and professional website for Luke Stahl

## About

Luke Stahl is a developer marketer and frontend developer who bridges the gap between marketing strategy and technical implementation. He specializes in building clean, performant sites and improving workflows across design and development teams.

## Site Structure

- Home: https://lucasstahl.com
- About: https://lucasstahl.com/about
- Projects/Builds: https://lucasstahl.com/builds
- Blog: https://lucasstahl.com/blog
- Gems: https://lucasstahl.com/gems
- Handbook: https://lucasstahl.com/handbook
- Status: https://lucasstahl.com/status

## Professional Focus

- Developer Marketing
- Frontend Web Development
- Product Strategy
- Content Strategy
- Technical Writing

## Technical Skills

### Frontend
React, Next.js, Astro, Vue, Swift, Tailwind CSS, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript

### Backend
Node.js, MongoDB, MySQL, GraphQL, Contentful, APIs, Cloud Deployment, Edge Functions

### Tools
Cursor, Claude Code, Figma, Webflow, Builder.io, Notion, GitHub, Vercel, PostHog, Supabase, Ahrefs, SurferSEO, ChatGPT, Gemini, FullStory, and more

### Marketing
Product Marketing, Digital & Web Marketing, Content Strategy, Analytics, SEO, Paid Media, Social, Email, Community, Events, Project Management

## Education

- Certificate in Full Stack Web Development - Northwestern University
- MA in Communications - Southern New Hampshire University

## Featured Projects

- Developer Hub: Modern developer portal built with Vite, React, and TypeScript
- SERP Tracker: Real-time search engine ranking tracker with React and Chart.js
- Stahlwalker Cookbook: Full-stack recipe app with Next.js and Contentful CMS
- Fantasy Football Legend: Showcase website for a Fantasy Football League

## Speaking

Conference speaker at Webflow Conf 2025 - "Webflow Cloud for Full-Stack Web Apps"

## Tech Stack

This site is built with Astro and deployed on GitHub Pages. Analytics powered by PostHog.
